column5: Russian newscaster Tatiana Subbotina tries her best to get through a story about a raid on a Canadian cannabis plantation that was guarded by bears, dogs, a pig, and a raccoon...  <object width="450" height="370"><param name="movie" value="http://www.liveleak.com/e/6f7_1305235838"></param><param'>http://www.liveleak.com/e/6f7_1305235838"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.liveleak.com/e/6f7_1305235838" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" wmode="transparent" allowscriptaccess="always" width="450" height="370"></embed></object>  I quickly googled it and it seems it's true...a story that broke in 2010... http://www.cbc.ca/news/canada/british-columbia/story/2010/08/17/bc-marijuana-grow-op-bears.html  http://cnews.canoe.ca/CNEWS/Canada/2011/05/07/18117726.html
Well I understand her problem  Marijuana makes me laugh too....a lot
I think she ate some of the mushrooms the pig was supposed to guard.
hahaha "why were they sitting? they could have been standing at least"  Canadians ARE funny!
I could  record yer laugh as a hen cluck.LOL  Mrs,s found it funny.
I think she smoked some!     She has an infectious laugh!
